ajito_fairy_020_cassiopeia_01: I see the guard has been dealt with. Good job.[VAR 0114(0009)]
ajito_fairy_020_cassiopeia_02:
That base belongs to Team Star’s Fairy crew—
the Ruchbah Squad.[VAR 0114(0009)]
ajito_fairy_020_cassiopeia_03: Their boss, Ortega, is the mechanic of the team.[VAR 0114(0009)]
ajito_fairy_020_cassiopeia_04:
He may be the youngest of the bosses, but his
battle skills are no joke. Underestimate him, and\r
things’ll go south for you quickly.[VAR 0114(0009)]
ajito_fairy_020_cassiopeia_05:
He’s also a real “lead from the back” type—he
gets his grunts to do all the dirty work for him.[VAR 0114(0009)]
ajito_fairy_020_cassiopeia_06:
But his weak point is his short fuse. Get him good
and angry, and he’ll march out to the front lines\r
to deal with you himself.[VAR 0114(0009)]
ajito_fairy_020_cassiopeia_07:
In terms of tactics...there’s nothing else for it but
to take down all the lackeys he sends your way.[VAR 0114(0009)]
ajito_fairy_020_cassiopeia_08:
Just tough it out until Ortega shows up, and go
from there.[VAR 0114(0009)]
ajito_fairy_020_cassiopeia_10:
Ring the bell on the gates once you’re ready to
kick off this phase of the operation.\c
Time to wipe the Ruchbah Squad off the map![VAR 0114(0009)]
